sentence.Network_en: A smoothed price curve could result in a serious miscalculation of the profit maximizing price point.

sentence.Network_en: The value - of - marginal - product curve is the labor demand curve for a competitive, profit - maximizing firm.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于一个竞争性的 、 利润最大化的企业来说,边际产值曲线就是劳动需求曲线.

sentence.Network_en: You can improve your chances of profit by sensible planning.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以通过合理计划来提高盈利的机会。
